snippet: The Colts’ quarterback set a single-game rookie passing record on Sunday, which earned his jersey a trip to the Hall of Fame.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Jersey warn by Indianapolis Colts quarterback Andrew Luck in record-setting game against Miami Dolphins will be displayed in the Hall of Fame's Pro Football Today Gallery; Luck threw for 433 yards, single-game rookie record, in 23-0 win over the Dolphins; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Colts’ quarterback set a single-game rookie passing record on Sunday, which earned his jersey a trip to the Hall of Fame.

headline.seo: Colts’ Andrew Luck Surrenders Jersey After Record Effort
headline.main: After a Record Effort, Luck Surrenders Jersey
headline.print_headline: After a Record Effort, Luck Surrenders Jersey
